events.name: TemperatureAlertTriggered
events.description: Triggered when temperature anomalies are detected during monitoring.

events.name: HumidityAlertTriggered
events.description: Triggered when humidity levels exceed safe thresholds.

events.name: ColdChainMonitoringFailed
events.description: Indicates a failure in cold chain monitoring process.

events.name: ColdChainMonitoringResumed
events.description: Indicates that cold chain monitoring has been resumed after a failure.

events.name: AlertAcknowledged
events.description: Indicates that an alert has been acknowledged by a user.

commands.name: TriggerAlert
commands.description: Triggered when temperature anomalies are detected during monitoring.

commands.name: ReportFailure
commands.description: Indicates a failure in cold chain monitoring process.

commands.name: ResumeMonitoring
commands.description: Indicates that cold chain monitoring has been resumed after a failure.

commands.name: AcknowledgeAlert
commands.description: Indicates that an alert has been acknowledged by a user.
